text.more:
Key findings:



- Highest PageRank centrality artists include: Picasso, Cezanne, Duchamp, Monet, van Gogh, Bellows, Gauguin and Cassatt
- Highest in-degree artists include: Picasso, Duchamp, Cezanne, van Gogh, Braque, Gauguin, Kandinsky, Johns, Pollock
- Degree distribution almost follows power-law (KS test p-value > 0.9)
- Assortativty by year of birth is high (0.679), degree assortativity is low (-0.012)
- Eight communities detected, some correlation with "Movement" and year of birth
- Negative relationship between PageRank and year of birth (p <<< 0.001; R^2 = 0.198)

Steps:


1) Crawl Wikipedia to collect data from pages categorised as "Modern Artists" (Python)
2) Produce edge list based upon which pages link to one another (Python)
3) Generate network and calculate summary statistics/modularity (Gephi)
4) Analyse network structure and module membership (R)
5) Export to HTML/CSS/JavaScript with Sigma.js

Done!
